identity.name: Cupid's Prank
identity.vibe: Playful Romance, Digital Scrapbook, Elegant Mischief
identity.emotional_tone: Warm, Intimate, Fun, Slightly Chaotic (Prank aspect)

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all H1-H3. Italicize key emotional words for emphasis.
usage_rules.body: Use Outfit for all UI text, forms, and descriptions. Keep it clean and legible.
usage_rules.accents: Use Caveat for 'handwritten' notes, tooltips, and the 'Prank' labels. Rotate these elements slightly (-2deg to 2deg) to feel organic.

usage.background_strategy: Use the 'background' color as the base. Overlay the 'paper_texture' image with opacity-50 and mix-blend-multiply for a tactile feel.
usage.text_contrast: Avoid pure black. Use deep burgundy (#4C0519) for high contrast text.
usage.call_to_action: Primary Red (#E11D48) with soft drop shadows (shadow-rose-300).

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding. Use gap-6 for grids.
layout.grid_strategy: Asymmetric Bento Grids. Avoid perfect symmetry. Offset images and text blocks.

decorations: Torn paper edges (CSS mask or SVG)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/20 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-rose-50 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-sm border border-white/50 shadow-soft rounded-2xl p-6 hover:shadow-floating transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-white border-rose-200 focus:border-rose-500 focus:ring-rose-200 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (Heart, Sparkles, Gift, Ghost for pranks)

animations.runaway_button: Use framer-motion to randomly translate X/Y on hover.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure rose-900 text is used on rose-50 backgrounds.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable runaway button effect if prefers-reduced-motion is true.

setup: Install fonts: Add Google Fonts link to index.html
Install dependencies: yarn add framer-motion canvas-confetti lucide-react
Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the rose color palette and fonts.
critical_rules: DO NOT use default Shadcn slate/gray colors. Override them with Rose/Burgundy tones.
Ensure the 'No' button in the prank template is IMPOSSIBLE to click (unless accessibility mode is on).
Use the paper texture as a subtle overlay on the body background.

do_not: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue' colors.
Do not use sharp square corners (unless for specific 'brutalist' template).
Do not make the prank 'mean' - keep it playful.
must_do: Ensure mobile responsiveness is perfect (most users will open links on phones).
